1.name: Ankush Singla
1.title: Co Founder
1.shortBio: Ankush has a Bachelor’s degree in CS from IIT Delhi and Masters in Computer Science from Stanford University...
1.bio: Ankush has a Bachelor’s degree in CS from IIT Delhi and Masters in Computer Science from Stanford University. He is a code enthusiast with previous experience at bigwigs like Amazon and Facebook. He currently teaches at Coding Ninjas.

2.name: Neha Sharma
2.title: Android Evangelist & Developer
2.shortBio: Neha has 7 years of professional experience. Web development has fed her passion for design and technology...
2.bio: Neha has 7 years of professional experience. Web development has fed her passion for design and technology for a long time. But coding for her is much more than a means to an end. She is one of the few women in India to have established a network of coders via JS Lover.

3.name: Akash Shukla
3.title: Community Manager, Developer Relations
3.shortBio: Akash has been supporting startup ecosystem for Google.
3.bio: He has been handling startups for Google in India.

4.name: Nishant Srivastava
4.title: Co Founder
4.shortBio: Software Engineer (3+ yrs experience) working constantly in the field of Android SDK development, Audio Engineering and Interaction Design.
4.bio: Software Engineer (3+ yrs experience) working constantly in the field of Android SDK development, Audio Engineering and Interaction Design. Avid dreamer, doodler and a caffeine dependent life-form. Keen observer of interfaces and their design. FOSS lover. Recommended by 4 out of 5 people that recommend things.

5.name: Rohit Gupta
5.title: Cloud Solution Engineer at Google
5.shortBio: Rohit protect Google's users and defend Google's integrity by fighting spam, fraud and abuse across Google products
5.bio: Rohit protect Google's users and defend Google's integrity by fighting spam, fraud and abuse across Google products. His team ensures product quality for the company's expanding base of advertisers, publishers and users.

6.name: Arpan Garg
6.title: Software Engineer
6.shortBio: Working as a lead software developer with Kalpavriksh Healthcare. Specializing in web development using Django, Ruby on Rails and front end technologies including HTML, CSS and JavaScript.
6.bio: Working as a lead software developer with Kalpavriksh Healthcare. Specializing in web development using Django, Ruby on Rails and front end technologies including HTML, CSS and JavaScript.

7.name: Nitika Agarwal
7.title: Software Developer
7.shortBio: Computer Science graduate 2016 from Netaji Subhas Institute of Technology, Software Developer at Adobe Systems Inc...
7.bio: Computer Science graduate 2016 from Netaji Subhas Institute of Technology, Software Developer at Adobe Systems Inc. Student Mentor 2016 at LearnIT, Girl! and Product Intern, Summer 2015 at Adobe Systems Inc. Anita Borg Scholar for attending Grace Hopper Celebration India 2015

8.name: Harsh Dattani
8.title: Android Security Engineer
8.shortBio: Harsh handles security for android platform for Google
8.bio: Harsh handles security for android platform for Google

9.name: Kshitij Aggarwal
9.title: Android Architect Engineer
9.shortBio: Android Developer, Mentor, Speaker and Amateur Photographer
9.bio: Android Developer, Mentor, Speaker and Amateur Photographer

10.name: Chhavi Gupta
10.title: Summer Intern 2016
10.shortBio: Software Engineering Intern, Summer 2016 at Google and Mentor for Google Summer Of Code...
10.bio: Software Engineering Intern, Summer 2016 at Google and Mentor for Google Summer Of Code, 2016 for Systers, An Anita Borg Institute. Active contributor to community and Open Source through various programmes, organizer for Learn It Girl!. Final Year student at Delhi Technological University (DCE). Sports lover.

11.name: Harshit Dwivedi
11.title: GSoCer 2016
11.shortBio: Participated and completed GSoC 2016 with FOSSASIA. Final year Undergraduate from USICT Dwarka.
11.bio: Participated and completed GSoC 2016 with FOSSASIA. Final year Undergraduate from USICT Dwarka.

12.name: Manan Wason
